Donnamaria Bruton (May 3, 1954 - September 9, 2012) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé otu ngalaba na Rhode Island School of Design, nke a maara màkà ihe osise mgbasa ozi ya na collages. Bruton rụrụ ọrụ na RISD malite na 1992, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi ngalaba na-ese ihe site na 2001 na 03, na dị ka ónyé na-anọchi anya dean nke Graduate Studies site na 2003 na05.
Ụdị Bruton, nke The Providence Journal kọwara dị ka "ụdị na-enweghị isi...

mana nke nwéré ike ime ihe n'eziokwu," na-eji ihe osise ya, eserese na nkà collage. Ọtụtụ n'ime collages ya na-eji ihe ndị ụwa dị ka isi ihe iji nweta ncheta miri emi ma ọ bụ echiche. Ihe ngosi mbụ ya bụ na 1993 na Austin, Texas, a nabatara ya nké ọma. Ka oge na-aga n'ọrụ ya, ogo nké ọrụ ya gbasaa, ọtụtụ n'ie ha ruru 8 site na 8 feet (2.4 site na 2.4 m).

Colman Award site na BNY Mellon na 1999. Ọrụ ya bụ akụkụ nke nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide na RISD Museum na Gwanjiu Museum na Korea, ya na ọtụtụ nchịkọta onwé. Ọrụ Bruton dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Newport Art Museum.
A mụrụ Bruton na Milwaukee, Wisconsin, na 1954

Nna ya bụ ónyé na-egwu baseball Bill Bruton, nna nna ya n'akụkụ nne ya bụ ónyé egwuregwu Negro leagues Judy Johnson. Ọ natara Bachelor of Fine Arts na Mahadum Michigan State, na Master of Fine Arts site na Mahadim Yale. Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru ónyé na-ese ihe Edward Loper ma gosipụta ya na Dell Pryor na Detroit. Ọ lụrụ Timothy Coutis na Jenụwarị 1999.
